body.p: Numerous XSLT code quality assurance checks are done during automatic validation to help you keep your stylesheets valid and well formed. performs the validation of XSLT documents with the help of an XSLT processor that you can configure in the preferences pages according to the XSLT version.

For XSLT 1.0, the options are: Xalan, Saxon , Saxon and a JAXP transformer specified by the main Java class. For XSLT 2.0, the options are: Saxon and a JAXP transformer specified by the main Java class. For XSLT 3.0, the options are Saxon and a JAXP transformer specified by the main Java class.
To access the XSLT preferences quickly, use the Validation options action from the Document Validate menu.
